minimal-resonate-script-py.desc:
Python SDK template.
This template includes just single function that is invoked locally.
This template doesn't require a Resonate Server — promises are stored in local memory.

local-run-workflow-py.desc:
Python SDK template. This template includes a local two step workflow.
Each step is defined and invoked locally.
This template doesn't require a Resonate Server — promises are stored in local memory

remote-rpc-workflow-py.desc:
Python SDK template. This template includes a remote two step workflow.
Each step is defined and invoked remotely.
This template requires a running Resonate Server to work. — promises are stored, and messages are sourced remotely
